<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Identifying LaTeX delimiter issues**

The LaTeX is not rendering because math expressions lack proper delimiters like `$...$` or `\[…\]`; updating the system prompt to instruct using these delimiters should improve future outputs. Existing messages using bare `[` instead of `\[` may need normalization or handling to render correctly.
**Planning math delimiter normalization plugin**

I'll implement a remark plugin to convert `\[` `\]` and `\(` `\)` math delimiters to `$` or `$$` so math renders correctly, avoiding replacements inside code nodes. I'll add CSS tweaks for KaTeX display styles and integrate the plugin before remark-math in the pipeline.</details></think>

**Planning preprocessing to normalize math blocks**

**Refactoring loading state to track tree and node**

Planning to replace the simple isLoading boolean with a loadingTarget object containing treeId and nodeId to accurately track loading per active tree and node, avoiding wrong highlights when switching trees. The render will derive loading booleans by comparing loadingTarget to current active tree and node IDs. I'll update handlers to set and clear this loadingTarget accordingly.
**Disabling inputs globally during loading**

Deciding to disable all send buttons and composer inputs whenever loadingTarget is set to prevent concurrent calls, using a global isLoading boolean for disabling. The UI will still show thinking only on the active node where loadingTarget matches current tree and node. I'll remove the old isLoading state and replace it with loadingTarget-based logic.</details></think>
